thread.title: DHS secretary wants wall built in two years
thread.title_full: DHS secretary wants wall built in two years | Washington Examiner

author: Anna Giaritelli
title: DHS secretary wants wall built in two years
text:
Homeland Security Sec. John Kelly on Wednesday said he would like to see the southern border wall built in the next two years.
"The wall will be built where it's needed first, and then it will be filled in. That's the way I look at it," Kelly told Fox News . "I really hope to have it done within the next two years."
The retired Marine Corps general spent part of Wednesday in the Rio Grande Valley of Texas meeting with border and immigration officials about the Trump administration's plan to move on promised tasks, including putting a secure wall up on the U.S.-Mexico border.
